metadata.title: CVE-2023-52591 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:reiserfs: Avoid touching renamed directory if parent does not changeThe VFS will not be locking moved directory if its parent does notchange. Change reiserfs rename code to avoid touching renamed directoryif its parent does not change as without locking that can corrupt thefilesystem.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
